effect_description.long_desc_key: Master yourself, master the enemy.

perk.name: perkSprinter
perk.desc_key: You are mastering the art of sprinting. Your sprinting speed increases.

effect_description.long_desc_key: Increase your sprinting speed by 7%.
Increase your sprinting speed by 14%.
Increase your sprinting speed by 21%.
Increase your sprinting speed by 28%.
Increase your sprinting speed by 35%.
Increase your sprinting speed by 42%.
Gotta go fast! Increase your sprinting speed by 50%.

perk.name: perkRunner
perk.desc_key: You are mastering the art of running. Your stamina recuperation increases.

effect_description.long_desc_key: Increase stamina regen by 4%.
Increase stamina regen by 8%.
Increase stamina regen by 12%.
Increase stamina regen by 16%.
Increase stamina regen by 20%..
Increase stamina regen by 24%.
It's about how much you can take and keep moving forward! Increase stamina regen by 30%.

perk.name: perkSurvivalist
perk.desc_key: You are conditioning your body to the maximum limits. Your tolerance towards the elements increases.

effect_description.long_desc_key: Increase your resistance agains heat and cold by 4 and reduce food and water loss from physical exertion by 4%.
Increase your resistance agains heat and cold by 8 and reduce food and water loss from physical exertion by 8%
Increase your resistance agains heat and cold by 12 and reduce food and water loss from physical exertion by 12%
Increase your resistance agains heat and cold by 16 and reduce food and water loss from physical exertion by 16%
Increase your resistance agains heat and cold by 20 and reduce food and water loss from physical exertion by 20%
Increase your resistance agains heat and cold by 24 and reduce food and water loss from physical exertion by 24%
You've mastered the art of surviving in the wilderness! Increase your resistance agains heat and cold by 30 and and reduce food and water loss from physical exertion by 30%.

perk.name: perkCalisthenics
perk.desc_key: You are mastering the excercising method of only using your body, enforcing a daily training regime and a balanced diet. Your maximum health and stamina increase.

effect_description.long_desc_key: Increase your maximum health and stamina by 5.
Increase your maximum health and stamina by 10.
Increase your maximum health and stamina by 15.
Increase your maximum health and stamina by 20.
Increase your maximum health and stamina by 25.
Increase your maximum health and stamina by 30.
You have the features of a demigod! Increase your maximum health and stamina by 40.

perk.name: perkScavenger
perk.desc_key: You are mastering the art of collecting every piece of scrap and armor you find lying around and then wearing it. Your damage reduction increases.

effect_description.long_desc_key: Increase your Damage Resistance by 1.2%.
Increase your Damage Resistance by 2.4%.
Increase your Damage Resistance by 3.6%.
Increase your Damage Resistance by 4.8%.
Increase your Damage Resistance by 6%.
Increase your Damage Resistance by 7.2%.
Вон он сука! *head, eyes*. Increase your Damage Resistance by 10%.

perk.name: perkMiner
perk.desc_key: You are mastering the art of digging deep. You find more stuff when gathering resources.

effect_description.long_desc_key: Harvest 7% more, gain 7% more experience and find rare valuables from ore, stone, terrain blocks and trees.
Harvest 14% more, gain 14% more experience and find rare valuables from ore, stone, terrain blocks and trees.
Harvest 21% more, gain 21% more experience and find rare valuables from ore, stone, terrain blocks and trees.
Harvest 28% more, gain 28% more experience and find rare valuables from ore, stone, terrain blocks and trees.
Harvest 35% more, gain 35% more experience and find rare valuables from ore, stone, terrain blocks and trees.
Harvest 42% more, gain 42% more experience and find rare valuables from ore, stone, terrain blocks and trees.
Rock and stone! Harvest 50% more, gain 50% more experience and find rare valuables from ore, stone, terrain blocks and trees.

perk.name: perkEfficiency
perk.desc_key: You are mastering minimal exertion while using weapons and tools. Lose less Stamina per melee swing.

effect_description.long_desc_key: Lose 3% less stamina while swinging melee tools and weapons.
Lose 6% less stamina while swinging melee tools and weapons.
Lose 9% less stamina while swinging melee tools and weapons.
Lose 12% less stamina while swinging melee tools and weapons.
Lose 15% less stamina while swinging melee tools and weapons.
Lose 18% less stamina while swinging melee tools and weapons.
You use precisely the amount of strength that you need. Lose 25% less stamina while swinging melee tools and weapons.

perk.name: perkShrimpPunch
perk.desc_key: You are mastering the art of the Mantis Shrimp Punch. Deal more melee entity and block damage.

effect_description.long_desc_key: Increase your Melee and Block Damage by 4%.
Increase your Melee and Block Damage by 8%.
Increase your Melee and Block Damage by 12%.
Increase your Melee and Block Damage by 16%.
Increase your Melee and Block Damage by 20%.
Increase your Melee and Block Damage by 24%.
Your attacks reach supersonic speeds! Increase your Melee and Block Damage by 30%.

perk.name: perkRapidBlows
perk.desc_key: You are mastering the art of rapid attacks. You are able too attack even faster.

effect_description.long_desc_key: Increase your Attack Speed with melee tools and weapons by 4%.
Increase your Attack Speed with melee tools and weapons by 8%.
Increase your Attack Speed with melee tools and weapons by 12%.
Increase your Attack Speed with melee tools and weapons by 16%.
Increase your Attack Speed with melee tools and weapons by 20%.
Increase your Attack Speed with melee tools and weapons by 24%.
Fast as lightning! Increase your Attack Speed with melee tools and weapons by 30%.

perk.name: perkCriminal
perk.desc_key: You are mastering Criminal activities. You make less noise while sneaking around and you're getting better at picking locks.

effect_description.long_desc_key: Decrease noise by 3% while crouching and deal 30% more damage while also undetected. You handle lockpicks 4% better.
Decrease noise by 6% while crouching and deal 60% more damage while also undetected. You handle lockpicks 8% better.
Decrease noise by 9% while crouching and deal 90% more damage while also undetected. You handle lockpicks 12% better.
Decrease noise by 12% while crouching and deal 120% more damage while also undetected. You handle lockpicks 16% better.
Decrease noise by 15% while crouching and deal 150% more damage while also undetected. You handle lockpicks 20% better.
Decrease noise by 18% while crouching and deal 180% more damage while also undetected. You handle lockpicks 24% better.
Click out of one, nothing on two, three is binding. Decrease noise by 25% while crouching and deal 250% more damage while also undetected. You handle lockpicks 30% better.

perk.name: perkCrafting
perk.desc_key: You are mastering crafting, allowing you to craft even faster than before.

effect_description.long_desc_key: Increase your crafting speed by 7%.
Increase your crafting speed by 14%.
Increase your crafting speed by 21%.
Increase your crafting speed by 28%.
Increase your crafting speed by 35%.
Increase your crafting speed by 42%.
Don't judge someone until you've stood at his forge and worked with his hammer. Increase your crafting speed by 60%.

perk.name: perkDismemberment
perk.desc_key: You are mastering the art of exploding enemy body parts. Get an additional chance to dismember with any weapon or fists.

effect_description.long_desc_key: Increase your chance to dismember by 1.2%.
Increase your chance to dismember by 2.4%.
Increase your chance to dismember by 3.6%.
Increase your chance to dismember by 4.8%.
Increase your chance to dismember by 6%.
Increase your chance to dismember by 7.2%.
Omae wa mou shindeiru. Increase your chance to dismember by 10%.

perk.name: perkMemorisation
perk.desc_key: You mastering the mnemonic method of memorisation. You are earning experience faster.

effect_description.long_desc_key: Increase your earned experience by 4%.
Increase your earned experience by 8%.
Increase your earned experience by 12%.
Increase your earned experience by 16%.
Increase your earned experience by 20%.
Increase your earned experience by 24%.
Your memorisation rivals that of Magnus Carlsen. Increase your earned experience by 30%.

perk.name: perkTriage
perk.desc_key: You are mastering the ways of triage increasing the effectivnes of medical items.

effect_description.long_desc_key: Increase the healing effectivnes of medical items by 8%.
Increase the healing effectivnes of medical items by 16%.
Increase the healing effectivnes of medical items by 24%.
Increase the healing effectivnes of medical items by 32%.
Increase the healing effectivnes of medical items by 40%.
Increase the healing effectivnes of medical items by 48%.
Hypocrite that you are to trust the chemicals in your brain to tell you they are chemicals. Increase the healing effectivnes of medical items by 60%.

perk.name: perkDoublePen
perk.desc_key: You are mastering the art of penetration. Enemy armor reduced and penetration count increased.

effect_description.long_desc_key: Ignore an additional 3% of armor with firearms, archery and spears. AP rounds penetrate an additional target or a block of up to 250 extra hit points when using Hunting, Marksman or Sniper Rifles.
Ignore an additional 6% of armor with firearms, archery and spears. AP rounds penetrate an additional target or a block of up to 250 extra hit points when using Hunting, Marksman or Sniper Rifles.
Ignore an additional 9% of armor with firearms, archery and spears. AP rounds penetrate two additional targets or blocks of up to 500 extra hit points when using Hunting, Marksman or Sniper Rifles.
Ignore an additional 12% of armor with firearms, archery and spears. AP rounds penetrate two additional targets or blocks of up to 500 extra hit points when using Hunting, Marksman or Sniper Rifles.

Ignore an additional 15% of armor with firearms, archery and spears. AP rounds penetrate three additional targets or blocks of up to 750 extra hit points when using Hunting, Marksman or Sniper Rifles.

Ignore an additional 18% of armor with firearms, archery and spears. AP rounds penetrate three additional targets or blocks of up to 750 extra hit points when using Hunting, Marksman or Sniper Rifles.

Diggy diggy hole! Ignore an additional 25% of armor with firearms, archery and spears. AP rounds penetrate four additional targets or blocks of up to 1000 extra hit points when using Hunting, Marksman or Sniper Rifles.

perk.name: perkLootGobbo
perk.desc_key: You are mastering the art of looting everything! You are more lucky when looting stuff!

effect_description.long_desc_key: Adds 3% to loot bonus and quantity. Looting is 1.2% faster.
Adds 6% to loot bonus and quantity. Looting is 2.4% faster.
Adds 9% to loot bonus and quantity. Looting is 3.6% faster.
Adds 12% to loot bonus and quantity. Looting is 4.8% faster.
Adds 15% to loot bonus and quantity. Looting is 6% faster.
Adds 18% to loot bonus and quantity. Looting is 7.2% faster.
WE IS BETTER THAN THEM!! Adds 25% to loot bonus and quantity. Looting is 10% faster.

perk.name: perkCrypto
perk.desc_key: You are researching the Cryptocurrency market values. Gathering the data. Your bartering Skills increase.

effect_description.long_desc_key: Get a 1.2% better deal buying and selling merchandise with traders.
Get a 2.4% better deal buying and selling merchandise with traders.
Get a 3.6% better deal buying and selling merchandise with traders.
Get a 4.8% better deal buying and selling merchandise with traders.
Get a 6% better deal buying and selling merchandise with traders.
Get a 7.2 better deal buying and selling merchandise with traders.
Since when were you under the impression that CRAB-17 was over? Get a 10% better deal buying and selling merchandise with traders.

perk.name: perkThinSkin
perk.desc_key: You are mastering your body control while wearing medium armor. Your movement speed and stamina costs while wearing Medium armor decrease.

effect_description.long_desc_key: Reduce Medium armor movement penalty by 5% and stamina penalty by 3%.
Reduce Medium armor movement penalty by 10% and stamina penalty by 6%.
Reduce Medium armor movement penalty by 15% and stamina penalty by 9%.
Reduce Medium armor movement penalty by 20% and stamina penalty by 12%.
Reduce Medium armor movement penalty by 25% and stamina penalty by 15.
Reduce Medium armor movement penalty by 30% and stamina penalty by 18%.
Requiescat in pace. Reduce Medium armor movement penalty by 40% and the stamina penalty by 25%.

perk.name: perkThickSkin
perk.desc_key: You are mastering your body control while wearing heavy armor. Your movement speed and stamina costs while wearing heavy armor decrease.

effect_description.long_desc_key: Reduce Heavy armor movement and stamina penalty by 3%.
Reduce Heavy armor movement and stamina penalty by 6%.
Reduce Heavy armor movement and stamina penalty by 9%.
Reduce Heavy armor movement and stamina penalty by 12%.
Reduce Heavy armor movement and stamina penalty by 15%.
Reduce Heavy armor movement and stamina penalty by 18%.
You have mastered the weight of Heavy Armor. Reduce Heavy armor movement and stamina penalty by 25%.

perk.name: perkSpartan
perk.desc_key: You are mastering the arts of the spear. Your damage, attack speed and throwing range with spears increases.

effect_description.long_desc_key: Increase your entity damage by 7%, attack speed by 1.2% and bleed chance by 12% while using spears.
Increase your entity damage by 14%, attack speed by 2.4% and bleed chance by 24% while using spears.
Increase your entity damage by 21%, attack speed by 3.6% and bleed chance by 36% while using spears.
Increase your entity damage by 28%, attack speed by 4.8% and bleed chance by 48% while using spears.
Increase your entity damage by 35%, attack speed by 6% and bleed chance by 60% while using spears.
Increase your entity damage by 42%, attack speed by 7.2% and bleed chance by 72% while using spears.
THIS - IS - SPARTAAA!! Increase your entity damage by 50%, attack speed by 10% and bleed chance by 100% while using spears.

perk.name: perkClubber
perk.desc_key: You are mastering the arts of the club. Your damage and attack speed with clubs increases.

effect_description.long_desc_key: Increase your entity damage by 7%. Damage is increased by an additional 12% if you hit a target while sprinting.
Increase your entity damage by 14%. Damage is increased by an additional 24% if you hit a target while sprinting.
Increase your entity damage by 21%. Damage is increased by an additional 36% if you hit a target while sprinting.
Increase your entity damage by 28%. Damage is increased by an additional 48% if you hit a target while sprinting.
Increase your entity damage by 35%. Damage is increased by an additional 60% if you hit a target while sprinting.
Increase your entity damage by 42%. Damage is increased by an additional 72% if you hit a target while sprinting.
You are Cheems with the power of Bonk. Send anyone to horny jail. Increase your entity damage by 50%. Damage is increased by an additional 100% if you hit a target while sprinting.

perk.name: perkHammerer
perk.desc_key: You are mastering the arts of the sledgehammer.

effect_description.long_desc_key: Increase your entity damage with sledgehammers by 12% and block damage by 20%.
Increase your entity damage with sledgehammers by 24% and block damage by 40%.
Increase your entity damage with sledgehammers by 36% and block damage by 60%.
Increase your entity damage with sledgehammers by 48% and block damage by 80%.
Increase your entity damage with sledgehammers by 60% and block damage by 100%.
Increase your entity damage with sledgehammers by 72% and block damage by 120%.
You are Bob the Builder's evil twin brother! Increase your entity damage with sledgehammers by 75% and block damage by 150%.

perk.name: perkHandyman
perk.desc_key: You are mastering the use of tools. You are dealing more damage to blocks and work faster.

effect_description.long_desc_key: Increase tool damage by 7% and block damage by 10%. Decrease the damage you receive through falling blocks by 7% while wearing tools.
Increase tool damage by 14% and block damage by 20%. Decrease the damage you receive through falling blocks by 14% while wearing tools.
Increase tool damage by 21% and block damage by 30%. Decrease the damage you receive through falling blocks by 21% while wearing tools.
Increase tool damage by 28% and block damage by 40%. Decrease the damage you receive through falling blocks by 28% while wearing tools.
Increase tool damage by 35% and block damage by 50%. Decrease the damage you receive through falling blocks by 35% while wearing tools.
Increase tool damage by 42% and block damage by 60%. Decrease the damage you receive through falling blocks by 42% while wearing tools.
You are your friend's wife's handyman. Increase tool damage by 50% and block damage by 75%. Decrease the damage you receive through falling blocks by 50% while wearing tools.

perk.name: perkMartialArts
perk.desc_key: You are mastering the martial arts. Your damage and overall speed increase while using fists and knuckles.

effect_description.long_desc_key: Increase your chance to explode heads by 1.2% and your attack and movement speed with fists and knuckles by 3%.
Increase your chance to explode heads by 2.4% and your attack and movement speed with fists and knuckles by 6%.
Increase your chance to explode heads by 3.6% and your attack and movement speed with fists and knuckles by 9%.
Increase your chance to explode heads by 4.8% and your attack and movement speed with fists and knuckles by 12%.
Increase your chance to explode heads by 6% and your attack and movement speed with fists and knuckles by 15%.
Increase your chance to explode heads by 7.2% and your attack and movement speed with fists and knuckles by 18%.
You are the Fist of the North Star. Increase your chance to explode heads by 10% and your attack and movement speed with fists and knuckles by 25%.

perk.name: perkBlademaster
perk.desc_key: You are mastering the arts of the blade. Your attack speed and bleeding stacks increase.

effect_description.long_desc_key: Increase your attack speed by 7% with bladed weapons. Increase the maximum stacks of bleed you can apply by 1.
Increase your attack speed by 14% with bladed weapons. Increase the maximum stacks of bleed you can apply by 2.
Increase your attack speed by 21% with bladed weapons. Increase the maximum stacks of bleed you can apply by 3.
Increase your attack speed by 28% with bladed weapons. Increase the maximum stacks of bleed you can apply by 4.
Increase your attack speed by 35% with bladed weapons. Increase the maximum stacks of bleed you can apply by 5.
Increase your attack speed by 42% with bladed weapons. Increase the maximum stacks of bleed you can apply by 6.
The warlocks of the Blackrock clan have spoken! Increase your attack speed by 50% with bladed weapons. Increase the maximum stacks of bleed you can apply by 7.

perk.name: perkEnforcer
perk.desc_key: You are mastering the arts of the baton. What you say, goes. Increase your entity damage and chance to knock down with batons.

effect_description.long_desc_key: Increase your entity damage with stun batons by 12% and an additional 7% chance to knock down enemies.
Increase your entity damage with stun batons by 24% and an additional 14% chance to knock down enemies.
Increase your entity damage with stun batons by 36% and an additional 21% chance to knock down enemies.
Increase your entity damage with stun batons by 48% and an additional 28% chance to knock down enemies.
Increase your entity damage with stun batons by 60% and an additional 35% chance to knock down enemies.
Increase your entity damage with stun batons by 72% and an additional 42% chance to knock down enemies.
STOP RESISTING!! Increase your entity damage by 100% with stun batons. Also gives you an additional 50% chance to knock down enemies.

perk.name: perkRifleman
perk.desc_key: You are mastering the arts of the rifle. Your damage and weapon handling increases.

effect_description.long_desc_key: Increase your entity damage and armor penetration by 7%.
Increase your entity damage and armor penetration by 14%.
Increase your entity damage and armor penetration by 21%.
Increase your entity damage and armor penetration by 28%.
Increase your entity damage and armor penetration by 35%.
Increase your entity damage and armor penetration by 42%.
You are Simo Hayha. Increase your entity damage and armor penetration by 50%.

perk.name: perkDemoman
perk.desc_key: You are mastering the art of throwing dynamite around. Vastly increase your damage and the chance to dismember with explosives.

effect_description.long_desc_key: Increase entity damage by 8% and provides an additional 1.2% chance to dismember.
Increase entity damage by 16% and provides an additional 2.4% chance to dismember.
Increase entity damage by 24% and provides an additional 3.6% chance to dismember.
Increase entity damage by 32% and provides an additional 4.8% chance to dismember.
Increase entity damage by 40% and provides an additional 6% chance to dismember.
Increase entity damage by 48% and provides an additional 7.2% chance to dismember.
Hey, as long as it works! Increase entity damage by 60% and provides an additional 10% chance to dismember.

perk.name: perkShotty
perk.desc_key: You are mastering the arts of the shotgun. Your entity damage and weapon handling increases.

effect_description.long_desc_key: Increase your entity damage with shotguns by 12% and reload speed by by 4%.
Increase your entity damage with shotguns by 24% and reload speed by by 8%.
Increase your entity damage with shotguns by 36% and reload speed by by 12%.
Increase your entity damage with shotguns by 48% and reload speed by by 16%.
Increase your entity damage with shotguns by 60% and reload speed by by 20%.
Increase your entity damage with shotguns by 72% and reload speed by by 24%.
Hey little sister, SHOTGUN! Increase your entity damage with shotguns by 100% and reload speed by by 30%.

perk.name: perkMarine
perk.desc_key: You are mastering the arts of automatic rifles. Your fire rate and weapon handling increases.

effect_description.long_desc_key: Increase your entity damage, weapon handling and reload speed with machine guns by 7%.
Increase your entity damage, weapon handling and reload speed with machine guns by 14%.
Increase your entity damage, weapon handling and reload speed with machine guns by 21%.
Increase your entity damage, weapon handling and reload speed with machine guns by 28%.
Increase your entity damage, weapon handling and reload speed with machine guns by 35%.
Increase your entity damage, weapon handling and reload speed with machine guns by 42%.
Live For Nothing, Or Die For Something. Increase your entity damage, weapon handling and reload speed with machine guns by 50%.

perk.name: perkBowman
perk.desc_key: You are mastering the arts of the bow. If thou are of pure heart the arrow shall miss, if thou are not, the arrow shall tear thee asunder.

effect_description.long_desc_key: Increase your entity damage, weapon handling, reload speed with bows by 7% and prepare an additional bolt/arrow per reload.
Increase your entity damage, weapon handling, reload speed with bows by 14% and prepare an additional bolt/arrow per reload.
Increase your entity damage, weapon handling, reload speed with bows by 21% and prepare 2 additional bolts/arrows per reload.
Increase your entity damage, weapon handling, reload speed with bows by 28% and prepare 2 additional bolts/arrows per reload.
Increase your entity damage, weapon handling, reload speed with bows by 35% and prepare 3 additional bolts/arrows per reload.
Increase your entity damage, weapon handling, reload speed with bows by 42% and prepare 3 additional bolts/arrows per reload.
Grip it, rip it, put it in the wind! Increase your entity damage, weapon handling, reload speed with bows by 50% and prepare 4 additional bolts/arrows per reload.

perk.name: perkSharpshooter
perk.desc_key: You are mastering the arts of sidearms. Every aspect of handgun handling increases.

effect_description.long_desc_key: Increase your fire rate, clip size and weapon handling by 7%, additionally reduces weapon degradation by 7%.
Increase your fire rate, clip size and weapon handling by 14%, additionally reduces weapon degradation by 14%.
Increase your fire rate, clip size and weapon handling by 21%, additionally reduces weapon degradation by 21%.
Increase your fire rate, clip size and weapon handling by 28%, additionally reduces weapon degradation by 28%.
Increase your fire rate, clip size and weapon handling by 35%, additionally reduces weapon degradation by 35%.
Increase your fire rate, clip size and weapon handling by 42%, additionally reduces weapon degradation by 42%.
The good, the bad and the ugly. Increase your fire rate, clip size and weapon handling by 50%, additionally reduces weapon degradation by 50%.

perk.name: perkRobotics
perk.desc_key: You are mastering the art of robotics. Your turret control range and magazine size increases.

effect_description.long_desc_key: Increase the entity damage by 7%, magazine size by 12 and the maximum active range of junk turrets by 12%.
Increase the entity damage by 14%, magazine size by 24 and the maximum active range of junk turrets by 24%.
Increase the entity damage by 21%, magazine size by 36 and the maximum active range of junk turrets by 36%.
Increase the entity damage by 28%, magazine size by 48 and the maximum active range of junk turrets by 48%.
Increase the entity damage by 35%, magazine size by 60 and the maximum active range of junk turrets by 60%.
Increase the entity damage by 42%, magazine size by 72 and the maximum active range of junk turrets by 72%.
Very crude systems can accomplish an awful lot! Increase the entity damage by 50%, magazine size by 100, the maximum active range of junk turrets by 100% and can have 1 additional active turret.
